94e7a9bf-9797-4835-bb46-70ee22f139db.description: This course describes the commonly accepted control objectives for business systems, such as to ensure that processing is complete, processing is accurate, and so forth. Also included is a method to follow in evaluating the controls documented to determine whether they are adequate for a business system. Click on Additional Details link at left for more info!
